syndication_details.description: Submitting existing supplier content through the CCP partner to Walmart.
Partners implement validation checks based on Walmart’s Style Guides.

summary: The page outlines the Connected Content Partners (CCPs) program at Walmart, detailing processes for syndication, content enrichment, rich media integration, and user-generated content. It emphasizes the importance of compliance with Walmart's Style Guides and provides an overview of the services offered by CCP partners.
